crf:comment.crf:summary: Reports the first patient/first visit and last patient/last visit per study and first recruited date
crf:comment.crf:notes: Only patient visits with a complete status are reported. For the 'first recruitment date' to be populated patients must have a current status of recruited and a recruitment date. Any patients with a 'recruited' status and incomplete recruitment visit (no recruitment date) will return a null value for this column.
crf:comment.crf:InternalNotes: Possibly need further follow up on how the recruited date is picked up whether it should only include patients with a completed recruitment date.

crf:query.name: Visits

crf:parameter.name: StudySummary
crf:parameter.displayName: Where the study identifier or name

crf:parameter.name: Status
crf:parameter.displayName: and include the following booking statuses
crf:parameter.crf:query: SELECT REStatusTypeID AS ValueField, RESTName AS TextField FROM view_ResourceEventStatusTypes VREST INNER JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT REStatusID FROM view_ResourceEvents WHERE (ResourceTypeID IN (1010,1018)) AND (REAreaID=301)) VRE ON VREST.REStatusTypeID=VRE.REStatusID ORDER BY RESTName;

crf:parameter.name: Site
crf:parameter.crf:query: SELECT ResourceID AS ValueField, ResourceName AS TextField FROM view_Resources WHERE ResourceTypeID=1016 ORDER BY ResourceName
